name: Iron Recon - Dev Test 1
description:
Drop Mech, shoot guns, squash enemies and win!

What is the game?
Iron Recon is a First-Person Shooter (FPS) game where you pilot a Mech to do reconnaissance on an unknown planet while fighting off hostile forces.  Drop onto enemy planets, destroy their bases and extract before they can retaliate.

This version is for testing!
This is a developer test of new features for Iron Recon. This version of Iron Recon involves a 5min playthrough of the game and a 2min survey to complete at the end. Your play-through and feedback would be much appreciated!

Further Information:
If you would like to play the full game with random missions you can download it here: https://noxas7.itch.io/iron-recon
